mapper.select: SELECT * FROM onedayclass_tb WHERE SYSDATE < Oneday_End
SELECT * FROM ONEDAYCLASS_TB c right join ONEDAYCLASSRS_TB r on c.oneday_no = r.oneday_no WHERE USER_NO=#{user_no}
mapper.insert: insert into onedayclassrs_tb (RESERV_NO , ONEDAY_NO , USER_NO , ONEDAY_REQUEST ) VALUES (OnedayRs_SEQ.nextval ,#{oneday_no} ,#{user_no} ,#{oneday_request} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ONEDAYCLASSRS_TB WHERE Oneday_No=#{oneday_no} and USER_NO=#{user_no} and SYSDATE > RESERV_DATE
mapper.update: UPDATE onedayclass_tb SET ONEDAY_TITLE=#{oneday_title} , ONEDAY_IMG=#{oneday_img} , ONEDAY_CONTENT=#{oneday_content} , ONEDAY_MAXPERSON=#{oneday_maxPerson} , ONEDAY_START=#{oneday_start} , ONEDAY_END=#{oneday_end} , ONEDAY_PRICE=#{oneday_price} , ONEDAY_PLACE=#{oneday_place} WHERE ONEDAY_NO=#{oneday_no}
